adHeader: Get Your Hair Color Done at a High End Salon!
adDetails: Would you like to come and get your hair colored at a high end San Francisco salon? We are now looking for models to come in and receive a color service done by a colorist participating in advanced education. Please provide a description of your hair and a photo if possible. We will need models for the next few Wednesday mornings and early afternoons, so if you are interested please respond with an email. Most color services are $25 for models.
